title: New Mindsets For New Times
description: Our mindset sets the tone of any engagement with our dreams, aspirations, ambitions, relationships, career, success and happiness. This book is intended to be a wakeup call to change your mindset because: - Skill and competence are no guarantee of success- Mindset influences your progress- You can influence your mindset- It takes more than guts to succeed- Strengthen your mindset and strengthen your life
author: Maurice Duffy
